    Add to Individual Occurrence Map

    mapAdd_rangePoly.Rd

    Add range polygons to an existing interactive map.

    Usage

    mapAdd_rangePoly(
  existing_map,
  taxon_dataframe,
  site_name = "",
  colour = "#60f",
  site_legend = T,
  poly_opacity = 0.4
)

    Arguments

    existing_map

    A map object that has been created using the map_start function.

    site_name

    An optional label to add the the coordinate pins.

    colour

    The colour of the coordinate pins.

    site_legend

    A boolean value to choose to add a site name legend to the map.

    poly_opacity

    An optional value to set the opacity of the polygon.

    clusterised_object

    An object created by the clusterise_sites functions.

    Value

    Coordinate pins to be added to an existing interactive map object.

    Examples

    # add site coordinates to an existing map
species_dataframe <- subset(Andes, species == "Boana crepitans")

map <- mapStart_rangePoly(species_dataframe, site_name = "Whole Dataset")

species_dataframe_split <- split(species_dataframe, species_dataframe$year)

map <- mapAdd_rangePoly(map, species_dataframe_split$`2011`, "2016", "purple")
map <- mapAdd_rangePoly(map, species_dataframe_split$`2013`, "2013", "green")
map <- mapAdd_rangePoly(map, species_dataframe_split$`2015`, "2015", "red")
map <- mapAdd_rangePoly(map, species_dataframe_split$`2017`, "2017", "blue")

map
